title: Predator

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, select a player to Hunt, then choose a player you think they will visit. If the player you Hunt visits the chosen player, you will shoot the Hunted player.
- At night, choose a player to Track, learning who they visit.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Retain your Background upon being converted.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate those you wish to not convert, or those who will not join you.

desc:
Post 4710
*People aren't much more than complex animals.*
